topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553ad664636872260cc50600#post_553ad664636872260cc50600
The original trilogy was a visual novel, but the new games are literally like final fantasy x pokemon.

"Monster Girl Quest: Paradox!  Gotta fuck them all!"

The game has a legit difficulty curve.  Getting the monsters to join your side is way harder than defeating them.  The more monsters you try to recruit the harder it gets, cause you can one shot some weak monsters but trying to get them to join you had better get a lot of potions and mana ready for even weak ones.
